content: Stream created by May Terry.
We'll be using this stream for collaborative ad-hoc discussions and announcements on the alignment of FHIR Oncology and OMOP oncology artifacts.
Confluence home page for the OMOP-FHIR Oncology use case: https://confluence.hl7.org/display/OOF/FHIR-OMOP+Oncology+Use+Case

Thanks all who joined in today's FHIR-OMOP Oncology use case kick-off meeting. For anyone who could not make the meeting and are interested in contributing, reach out and come aboard anytime - look here regularly for updates. We'll be updating our newly established homepage https://confluence.hl7.org/display/OOF/FHIR-OMOP+Oncology+Use+Case
Please feel free to join our initiative as we work towards the goal of aligning FHIR and the OMOP CDM for the purposes of building an oncology learning health system that exchanges patient data for large scale observational studies and analytics.
Might it make sense to move this stream to a topic in the omop + fhir stream?

reason to not do that is because we'll eventually get into details which creates spam in the more general topic. We ran into similar situations with other HL7 "sub-efforts" like Da Vinci and it resulted in dedicated streams. Nevertheless, we'll definitely re-post the overall event information to the more general channel.
